languages.text: "Не уверен. Но мне не нравится, как пялятся на нас местные. Я бы сказал, это все твоя чарующая харизма. Но, боюсь, дело в доспехах блюстителя".

traits.locale_text: "Знаешь ощущение, когда тебя сверлят взглядом, а ты не можешь понять, кто и с какой стороны? Я чувствую это прямо сейчас. Она где-то поблизости".

languages.text: "I'm not sure, but I don't like the way the locals are staring at us. Maybe it's your captivating charisma, but I much more suspect that the enforcer's armour is to blame."
languages.original_text: "Не уверен. Но мне не нравится, как пялятся на нас местные. Я бы сказал, это все твоя чарующая харизма. Но, боюсь, дело в доспехах блюстителя".

traits.locale_text: "I am not sure, but I do not like the way the locals are staring at us. Maybe it is your captivating charisma, but I am afraid it is the enforcer's armour that is to blame."
"I am not sure, but I do not like the way the locals are staring at us. Maybe it is your captivating charisma, but I am afraid it is the enforcer's armour that is to blame."
"I am not sure, but I do not like the way the locals are staring at us. Maybe it is your captivating charisma, but I much more suspect that the enforcer's armour is to blame."

"I'm not sure, but I don't like the way the locals are staring at us. Maybe it's your captivating charisma, but I much more suspect that the enforcer's armour is to blame."

languages.text: "Ich weiß es nicht genau, aber mir gefällt das gar nicht, wie die Einheimischen uns anstarren. Vielleicht ist das Eure faszinierende Ausstrahlung, aber ich vermute, es liegt wohl doch eher an der Enforcer-Rüstung."
languages.original_text: "I'm not sure, but I don't like the way the locals are staring at us. Maybe it's your captivating charisma, but I much more suspect that the enforcer's armour is to blame."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß es nicht genau, aber mir gefällt das gar nicht, wie die Einheimischen uns anstarren. Vielleicht ist das Eure faszinierende Ausstrahlung, aber ich vermute, es liegt wohl doch eher an der Enforcer-Rüstung."

languages.text: «No sé, no me gusta cómo nos mira esta gente. Igual es por tu carisma, pero creo que la culpa es de la armadura de seguridad».
languages.original_text: "I'm not sure, but I don't like the way the locals are staring at us. Maybe it's your captivating charisma, but I much more suspect that the enforcer's armour is to blame."

traits.locale_text: «No sé, no me gusta cómo nos mira esta gente. Igual es por tu carisma, pero creo que la culpa es de la armadura de seguridad».

languages.text: 「わからないけど、現地民の俺たちを見る目が好きじゃないんだ。あんたの人を惹きつけるカリスマ性のせいかもしれないが、むしろあのエンフォーサーのアーマーのせいじゃないか疑ってるんだ」
languages.original_text: "I'm not sure, but I don't like the way the locals are staring at us. Maybe it's your captivating charisma, but I much more suspect that the enforcer's armour is to blame."

traits.locale_text: 「わからないけど、現地民の俺たちを見る目が好きじゃないんだ。あんたの人を惹きつけるカリスマ性のせいかもしれないが、むしろあのエンフォーサーのアーマーのせいじゃないか疑ってるんだ」

languages.text: “我说不太好，但我不喜欢那些人盯着我们的样子。或许是你的魅力太吸引人了，但我更怀疑，可能是你的执法者盔甲引起了所有人的注意。”
languages.original_text: "I'm not sure, but I don't like the way the locals are staring at us. Maybe it's your captivating charisma, but I much more suspect that the enforcer's armour is to blame."

traits.locale_text: “我说不太好，但我不喜欢那些人盯着我们的样子。或许是你的魅力太吸引人了，但我更怀疑，可能是你的执法者盔甲引起了所有人的注意。”

languages.text: « J'aime pas trop la manière dont les habitants du coin nous regardent. Tout le monde sait que t'as un charisme hors norme, mais je serai plutôt d'avis que c'est à cause de l'armure des prévôts. »
languages.original_text: "I'm not sure, but I don't like the way the locals are staring at us. Maybe it's your captivating charisma, but I much more suspect that the enforcer's armour is to blame."

traits.locale_text: « J'aime pas trop la manière dont les habitants du coin nous regardent. Tout le monde sait que t'as un charisme hors norme, mais je serai plutôt d'avis que c'est à cause de l'armure des prévôts. »

languages.text: "Emin değilim ama yerlilerin bize bakışlarından hoşlanmadım. Büyüleyici karizman yüzünden de olabilir ama daha çok infazcı zırhından dolayı baktıklarını tahmin ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I'm not sure, but I don't like the way the locals are staring at us. Maybe it's your captivating charisma, but I much more suspect that the enforcer's armour is to blame."
